articles.author: Sean Murphy
articles.title: Irish newlyweds miss out on €5,000 cruise together after Aer Lingus flight nightmare - Irish Mirror
articles.description: A systems outage on Saturday caused the cancellation of 52 Aer Lingus flights in and out of Dublin Airport for destinations in Europe and the UK.
articles.content:
Furious Aer Lingus passengers lashed out after they were told their flights would go ahead only for them to be cancelled when they got through security.
Similar horror stories were revealed yesterda… [+5433 chars]

articles.title: Swedish voters boost anti-immigration party amid high crime - CTV News
articles.description: A populist anti-immigration party has surged to become Sweden's second-largest political force after a national election dominated by fears of gang violence, which has given the once-safe Scandinavian country one of Europe's highest levels of gun violence.
articles.content:
STOCKHOLM -
